Publication Title: A common goal to CARE: Cancer Advocates, Researchers, and Clinicians Explore current treatments and clinical trials for breast cancer brain metastases
Publication Authors: Natalie S Joe, Christine Hodgdon, Lianne Kraemer, Kristin J Redmond, Vered Stearns, Daniele M Gilkes
Publication Abstract: Breast cancer is the most commonly diagnosed cancer in women worldwide. Approximately one-tenth of all patients with advanced breast cancer develop brain metastases resulting in an overall survival rate of fewer than 2 years. Publication Title: Collagen VI deposition mediates stromal T cell trapping through inhibition of T cell motility in the prostate tumor microenvironment
Publication Keywords: T cells, prostate cancer, Collagen Vi
Publication Authors: Hawley C Pruitt, Ya Guan, Hudson Liu, Alexis E Carey, W Nathaniel Brennen, Jiayun Lu, Corrine Joshu, Ashani Weeraratna, Tamara L Lotan, T S Karin Eisinger-Mathason, Sharon Gerecht
Publication Abstract: The tumor extracellular matrix (ECM) is a barrier to anti-tumor immunity in solid tumors by disrupting T cell-tumor cell interaction underlying the need for elucidating mechanisms by which specific ECM proteins impact T cell motility and activity within the desmoplastic stroma of solid tumors.
